# Thread Attributes

## thread.id

Current “managed” thread ID.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `integer` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `56` |

## thread.name

Current thread name.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `main` |
